caseTitle: Naveed Asghar and others v. The State
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Scope of murder reference – heinous nature of crime not to influence the mind of the judge - standard of care required for relying on circumstantial evidence – scope of last seen evidence – effect of material improvements made by witnesses – evidentiary value of blood stained weapons – recovery of weapon of offence is corroborative evidence – medical evidence not corroborative but supportive evidence.
